page.title: 12Ormesby Public Library
page.content: The library in Ormesby is very handy because it is not far from anybody. The books are quite good if you need any information. There is a fairly good selection of books for 2year olds to any age. There is a section for little children and most of the books are interesting, Iknow because when they find a book they like they go quiet. In the daytime from 11.30a.m until 12.30 p.m. there is a playgroup. The smaal children can play, paint or play with the toys. The adult section in the library has at least 900 books and there is a reference section.The library has the daily newspaper so that people may read the news without having to buy a paper.There are also bus and rail timetables and posters showing local events and organisations.
